channel.title: [Delta] [317] Need quest to complete item? help plz [317] [Delta]
channel.description:
Hey guys, when a player tries to wield a dragon long sword:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/wieldsword.gif[/img]
it doesn't let them - it comes up with this message:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/quest.gif[/img]
how do i make it so you don't have to do the quest to wield the item?

item.title: [Delta] [317] Need quest to complete item? help plz [317] [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“mrpopyman, post:1, topic:400792”]Hey guys, when a player tries to wield a dragon long sword:

it doesn’t let them - it comes up with this message:

how do i make it so you don’t have to do the quest to wield the item?[/quote]

search in client.java for 1305. There will stand something like. if(itemID == 1305 && q2 != 15){ sM("...."); }
remove that piece of code and you can equip it without doing the quest. If u don’t find the 1305 try to look in the public boolean wear.

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] [317] Need quest to complete item? help plz [317] [Delta]
